reauth_confirm.title: [%key:common::config_flow::title::reauth%]
reauth_confirm.description: Your current API key: {api_key} is no longer valid. Please enter a new valid API key.

data.max_tokens: Maximum tokens to return in response
data.harassment_block_threshold: Negative or harmful comments targeting identity and/or protected attributes
data.hate_block_threshold: Content that is rude, disrespectful, or profane
data.sexual_block_threshold: Contains references to sexual acts or other lewd content
data.dangerous_block_threshold: Promotes, facilitates, or encourages harmful acts

data_description.prompt: Instruct how the LLM should respond. This can be a template.
data_description.enable_google_search_tool: Only works with "No control" in the "Control Home Assistant" setting. See docs for a workaround using it with "Assist".

error.invalid_google_search_option: Google Search cannot be enabled alongside any Assist capability, this can only be used when Assist is set to "No control".

generate_content.name: Generate content
generate_content.description: Generate content from a prompt consisting of text and optionally images

prompt.name: Prompt
prompt.example: Describe what you see in these images

filenames.name: Attachment filenames
filenames.description: Attachments to add to the prompt (images, PDFs, etc)

deprecated_image_filename_parameter.title: Deprecated 'image_filename' parameter
deprecated_image_filename_parameter.description: The 'image_filename' parameter in Google Generative AI actions is deprecated. Please edit scripts and automations to use 'filenames' instead.
